## Introduction
  
  This is the landing page (i.e. index.qmd) of a multi page document rendered using  the **book** Quarto project in html format. It follows UK Data Service guidelines and has been approved by Comms.
  It includes an example R page, and example Stata page and basic instructions on how to create your own documents using this one as template. 

Feel free to make any  suggestions to improve this document: [pierre.walthery@manchester.ac.uk](mailto:opierre.walthery@manchester.ac.uk)

### Features:
  
  - UKDS logo with alt-text and hyperlink in the sidebar
  - Document navigation bar on the left-hand side
  - Page table of contents on the right hand side
  - UKDS default colour for text: i.e. purple
  - UKDS font: Open Sans directly downloaded from Google
  - Examples of alt text for image and graph generated by code. 
  - A pdf version of the content can optionally be created
